groupArn.description:
The name or the ARN of the resource group to add resources to.

The following arguments are optional:

resourceArn.description: The ARN of the resource to be added to the group.

resourceType.description: The resource type of a resource, such as `AWS::EC2::Instance`.

groupArn.description:
The name or the ARN of the resource group to add resources to.

The following arguments are optional:

resourceArn.description: The ARN of the resource to be added to the group.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Resource resources.
